summary: Adds a powerful axe-wielding knight in Solitude, The Winking Skeever
descriptionHtml:
In Solitude's Winking Skeever rests a knight of great fame. Once known as the Thirty-Man Slayer, also known as the Bear-Slaughterer, the Grey Knight Bazuso waits for someone with the balls to hire him so that he may return to his past notoriety. 

 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

This mod adds one voiced follower in Solitude, the Winking Skeever. 

Bugs: Bazuso might not be voiced, if that's the case, save and quit. He should be voiced from then on. He might also use a bow. This is because Bethesda had the brilliant idea of giving every follower (modded or otherwise) one. It shouldn't be too big of a deal, just trade with him and remove it from his inventory. Unfortunately, it will respawn if you decide to rehire him later. 

Credits: 

Berserk for the character of Bazuso 
redxavier for his work on Bazuso's helmet 
Deck16 for his guide on follower creation 
The meshes and textures belong to CD-Projekt, the developer of the Witcher 2, who have allowed the use of their game assets provided they are given credit. 
ME?!
author: MaskDeMasque
